mapper.select: select b.bQuantity as pQuantity, p.pPrice as pPrice, b.btitle as pTitle, b.bstate as pState, b.boption as pOption, s.sname as psName, s.stel as psTel, p.pimg1 as pImg, b.bQuantity*p.pprice as pTotal, u.mpoint as pPoint, u.Memail as pEmail, u.mtel as pUtel, u.Maddr as pAddr, u.mname as pUname from buy b inner join product p on b.pid = p.pid inner join store s on s.sid = p.sid inner join users u on b.username = u.username where b.bid= #{list}
